snippet: Single-serve brewing machines are soaring in popularity, but the cost of the coffee is far higher than it may seem.
abstract: Single-serve brewing machines are soaring in popularity, but the cost of the coffee, at around $50 a pound, is far higher than it may seem; most high-end coffees cost less than $20 a pound, and the coffees you find on supermarket shelves are substantially cheaper;
lead_paragraph: Single-serve brewing machines are soaring in popularity, but the cost of the coffee is far higher than it may seem.

headline.seo: Single-Serve Coffee Brewers Make Convenience Costly
headline.main: With Coffee, the Price of Individualism Can Be High
headline.print_headline: With Coffee, the Price of Individualism Can Be High
